page.title: 14E.Horsley S. Hotel & Pubs.
page.content: Thatchers Hotel is part of the "Best Western" group of hotels. A pictur- esque building, it was once thatched but burnt down - it stands in 3 acres. There are 28 bedrooms, restaurant, gardens, lounge and heated open-air swimming pool. There are conference facilities for 65 delegates and wedding receptions, charity events, dinner-dances etc. can be catered for. 35-40 staff are employed. The "Duke of Wellington" pub. opposite caters to passing traffic & locals, serves snacks & meals, as well as the usual beers, wines & spirits to those who only wish to drink. On the extreme south of the area is "The Ranmore Arms", a public house whose clientele arrive in cars, enjoy bar food, disco music and can sit out- side in pleasant woodland if they wish.
